name: 8 Beats 1 Bite
description:
You were tasked to rig a mechatronic bear whose design is owned by ComputerSoft Co. and was stolen. Unfortunately, you have no idea what the small device you have inserted is capable of...

8 Beats 1 Bite is a light horror game where you attempt to escape a loop of repeating hallways. Don't familiarise the hallways and let your guard down. Something new is always there to haunt you. This game tells the story of two brothers from the Kingdom of Twilight and another two brothers from the Republic of Quaterry.

You play as Three, in other words, you are playing as me. You wake up one night, finding yourself in a place you do not know. Find your little brother and escape, if you can...

As you traverse through the hallways, try to uncover Mario's past (and maybe even try to realise what you have done).

Made by 14315 Productions.
